Verses: 1 andriyum, Sagodharare, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Varugaiyaiyum, Naam Avaridaththile Serkkappaduvadhaiyunguriththu, Naangal Ungalai Vendikkollugiradhu Ennavendraal,

2 oru Aaviyinaalaavadhu, Vaarththaiyinaalaavadhu, Engalidaththilirundhu Vandhadhaaith Thondrugira Oru Nirubaththinaalaavadhu, Kiristhuvinudaiya Naal Sameebamaayirukkiradhaaga Sollappattaal, Udane Sanjalappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Irungal.
3 evvidhaththinaalum Oruvanum Ungalai Mosampogaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Enenil Visuvaasa Dhurogam Mundhi Nerittu, Kettin Maganaagiya Paavamanushan Velippattaalozhiya, Andha Naal Varaadhu.

4 avan Edhirththunirkiravanaayum, Dhevan Ennappaduvadhedhuvo, Aaraadhikkappaduvadhedhuvo, Avaiyellaavatrirkum Melaagath Thannai Uyarththugiravanaayum, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththil Dhevanpola Utkaarndhu, Thannaiththaan Dhevanendru Kaanbikkiravanaayum Iruppaan.
6 avan Than Kaalaththile Velippadumpadikku, Ippozhudhu Avanaith Thadaiseygiradhu Innadhendrum Arindhirukkireergal.
7 akkiramaththin Ragasiyam Ippozhudhe Kiriyaiseygiradhu; Aanaalum Thadaiseygiravan Naduvilirundhu Neekkappadumunne Adhu Velippadaadhu.
8 neekkappadumpodhu, Andha Akkiramakkaaran Velippaduvaan; Avanaik Karththar Thammudaiya Vaayin Suvaasaththinaale Azhiththu, Thammudaiya Varugaiyin Pirasannaththinaale Naasampannuvaar.
9 andha Akkiramakkaaranudaiya Varugai Saaththaanudaiya Seyalinpadi Sagala Vallamaiyodum Adaiyaalangalodum Poiyaana Arpudhangalodum,
10 kettuppogiravargalukkulle Aneedhiyinaal Undaagum Sagalavidha Vanjagaththodum Irukkum. Ratchikkappadaththakkadhaaich Saththiyaththinmelulla Anbai Avargal Angigariyaamarponapadiyaal Appadi Nadakkum.
11 aagaiyaal Saththiyaththai Visuvaasiyaamal Aneedhiyil Piriyappadugira Yaavarum Aakkinaikkullaakkappadumpadikku,
12 avargal Poiyai Visuvaasikkaththakkadhaagak Kodiya Vanjagaththaith Dhevan Avargalukku Anuppuvaar.

13 karththarukkup Piriyamaana Sagodharare, Neengal Aaviyinaale Parisuththamaakkappadugiradhinaalum, Saththiyaththai Visuvaasikkiradhinaalum Ratchippadaiyumpadikku, Aadhimudhal Dhevan Ungalaith Therindhukondapadiyinaale, Naangal Ungalaikkuriththu Eppozhudhum Dhevanai Sthoththirikkak Kadanaaligalaayirukkirom.
14 neengal Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Magimaiyai Adaiyumporuttaaga Engal Suviseshaththinaale Andha Ratchippukku Avar Ungalai Azhaiththaar.
15 aagaiyaal, Sagodharare, Neengal Nilaikondu, Vaarththaiyinaalaavadhu Nirupaththinaalaavadhu Naangal Ungalukku Ubadhesiththa Muraimaigalaik Kaikkollungal.
16 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvum, Nammidaththil Anbukoorndhu Niththiya Aarudhalaiyum Nalnambikkaiyaiyum Kirubaiyaai Namakkuk Koduththirukkira Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanum,
17 ungal Irudhayangalaith Thetri, Ellaa Nalvasanaththilum Narkiriyaiyilum Ungalai Sthirappaduththuvaaraaga.
